variable.name: FAMID
variable.description: Family ID; same as SUBJID of trio offspring; one QC trio per 96-well plate

variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: Unique SUBJID; collection site ID (called SiteSubjID in phenotypic files) consisting of Site (2 digits for MGS1 collection, and 3 digits for MGS2 collection), Family (4 digits for MGS1 or MGS2 collections) and Individual_within_family (3 digits for MGS1 or MGS2 collections) with hyphens between the 3 elements for the cases and parents
